New in v0.9.3
=============

Release on Spetember 16, 2018

* Added support for OpenSSL 1.1.1 (or in general versions without letter).
* Allows to specify OCSP responder URI
  (see [Recommendation 9](https://gist.github.com/sleevi/5efe9ef98961ecfb4da8))


New in v0.9.2
=============

Release on April 28, 2017

* Added support for OpenSSL 1.1.
* Added OpenSSL version detection. 


Older versions
==============

The initial release was v0.9.0, with a bugfix release v0.9.1 soon after.
They were released on April 23 and 24, 2017.
